ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They glorify Him by night and day, without ever flagging.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Nor cease to endeavour praising Him night and day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They glorify Him night and day, without flagging.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They glorify Him day and night without fail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They say His Purity night and day, and do not slacken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They glorify His praises night and day, they never slacken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They glorify (Him) by night and day; they are never languid.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: glorifying Him by night and in the daytime and never failing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They glorify (Him) night and day; they flag not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: they glorify Him night and day without tiring.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they hallow Him night and day, and they flag not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They glorify [Him] night and day, and they do not flag.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They celebrate His praises night and day, nor do they ever flag or intermit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They (i.e. the angels) glorify His Praises night and day, (and) they never slacken (to do so).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They never fail to exalt Him either at night or in the day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They praise night and day, without ever tiring.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They exalt [Him] night and day [and] do not slacken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:20] They glorify [Him] night and day, and they do not falter, in it, for it comes to them as [naturally as] breathing comes to us, [something] which we can never be distracted from.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They glorify (Him) night and day) they pray to Him at night and during the day; (they flag not) they do not get bored of worshipping Allah and of acknowledging His Lordship.
